TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CookieContainer extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a container for a collection of objects.

span.span: Provides a container for a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是可为提供存储的数据结构的实例类，并且以类似于数据库的方式访问的哪一。A is a data structure that provides storage for instances of the class, and which is accessed in a database-like manner. 的容量限制，容器会创建或更改属性时设置。The has a capacity limit that is set when the container is created or changed by a property. 实例类添加到基于其起始 URI 的容器。An instance of the class is added to the container based on its originating URI. 将其添加到内部与 URI 关联。It is added to an internal associated with the URI. A检索从基于 URI 作为容器，或作为可用于提交 HTTP WebRequests 的字符串。A is retrieved from the container based on the URI as a , or as a string that can be used to submit HTTP WebRequests. 具有一些控制的卷容器的内容的三个属性： ， ，和。The has three properties that govern the volume of the content of the container: , , and . 这些值具有 300 的默认设置、 4096 和 20 分别。These values have the default settings of 300, 4096, and 20 respectively. 当添加到容器，这些属性用于确定是否已包含在应放弃新的留出空间。When a is added to the container, these properties are used to determine whether a already contained in the should be discarded to make room for the new one. 跟踪以确保每次添加既不也不超出限制。The keeps track of each addition to ensure that neither the nor the limits are exceeded. 如果一个或两个超过，然后实例持有会删除。If one or both are exceeded, then instances held by the are removed. 首先，所有过期中删除。First, any expired is removed. 如果必须重新捕获更多容量，则最早使用清除一次。If further capacity must be recaptured, then the least-recently used is purged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性数等于或超过属性，一个或多个添加之前从容器删除实例`cookie`参数。If the property equals or exceeds the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the `cookie` parameter. 足够删除实例以使下面，如下所示： 如果给定作用域中存在过期的实例，它们被清理。Enough instances are removed to bring below as follows: if there are expired instances in the given scope, they are cleaned up. 如果不是，然后最近最少使用找到并从容器中移除。If not, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性等于属性，一个或多个之前添加的内容从容器删除实例`cookies`参数。If the property equals the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the contents of the `cookies` parameter. 足够删除实例，以便腾出空间供`cookies`，如下所示： 如果有过期的实例，它们被清理。Enough instances are removed to make room for `cookies` as follows: if there are expired instances, they are cleaned up. 如果没有，或者如果需要更多的空间，然后最近最少使用找到并从容器中移除。If not, or if more room is needed, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你添加只在一个特定的主机实例时，未设置属性实例。If you add a instance for just one specific host, do not set the property of the instance. 它自动设置，根据的 URI。This is set automatically, based on the URI. 如果你的 URI 对应于本地域，并且将发送到本地域上的所有主机设置属性等于".local"。If your URI corresponds to your local domain and sends to all the hosts on the local domain, set the property equal to ".local". 否则，请确保它匹配的 URI 中使用的主机名。Otherwise, make sure it matches the host name used in the URI. 如果属性是 Netscape，属性，如果没有组显式，派生自 URI 和是从 URI，包括页名称的完整路径。If the property of a is Netscape, the property of the , if not set explicitly, is derived from the URI and is the complete path from the URI, including the page name. 如果属性等于属性，一个或多个添加之前从容器删除实例`cookie`参数。If the property equals the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the `cookie` parameter. 足够删除实例以使下面，如下所示： 如果在作用域中存在过期的实例，它们被清理。Enough instances are removed to bring below as follows: if there are expired instances in scope, they are cleaned up. 如果不是，然后最近最少使用找到并从容器中移除。If not, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

summary.span: Gets the HTTP cookie header that contains the HTTP cookies that represent the instances that are associated with a specific URI.

span.span: Gets the HTTP cookie header that contains the HTTP cookies that represent the instances that are associated with a specific URI.

returns.span: An HTTP cookie header, with strings representing instances delimited by semicolons.

span.span: An HTTP cookie header, with strings representing instances delimited by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回一个字符串，包含的 HTTP cookie 标头实例指定`uri`。 returns a string that holds the HTTP cookie header for the instances specified by `uri`. 通过添加的字符串表示形式每个生成的 HTTP 标头与关联`uri`。The HTTP header is built by adding a string representation of each associated with `uri`. 请注意，字符串的确切格式取决于 RFC，符合。Note that the exact format of the string depends on the RFC that the conforms to. 所有字符串与关联的实例`uri`才合并，并以分号分隔。The strings for all the instances that are associated with `uri` are combined and delimited by semicolons. 此字符串不是用作第二个参数的正确格式方法。This string is not in the correct format for use as the second parameter of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果新值小于当前值，如果任何域集合包含的详细信息和实例的新值，会将集合修剪以适合。If the new value is less than the current value, and if any of the domain collections contain more instances than the new value, the collections are pruned to fit. 这将使用相同的基本规则中所述属性。This uses the same basic rules as described in the property. 但是，这将执行清理过程仅在此域的集合。However, this does the clean-up only on the collection for this domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提取外的 HTTP cookie 标头的所有 HTTP cookie，生成每个，然后将每个添加到内部URI 与该键相关联。 pulls all the HTTP cookies out of the HTTP cookie header, builds a for each one, and then adds each to the internal that is associated with the URI. 中的 HTTP cookie`cookieHeader`必须由逗号分隔字符串。The HTTP cookies in the `cookieHeader` string must be delimited by commas.
